question: Do you have a medical opinion from an eye doctor describing the need for optics?
Has the opinion been registered electronically in the EOPYY system?
Do you suffer from a specific vision-related condition (eg keratoconus)?
Have you been reimbursed for optics by EOPYY before?
If so, when did you receive the last compensation?
Do you have a purchase receipt or invoice from an optical shop?
Was the store contracted with EOPYY
